Oh, hello! Right this way, please!

Hello! I’m glad to meet you. My name is Teala,
and I’m your guide to the Pokémon Global Club.
I hope you enjoy your time in the Global Room!

This is the Global Club.
May I help you with anything?

Let me explain how to participate in the
{pageend:Pokémon Global Club!}
You can enter the Global Room from either of
the two counters on the left, or by pressing the
{pageend:Y Button!}
In the Global Room, you can set up Link Trades,
Link Battles, and so on with Trainers from all over
the world!
Please do visit again.
Would you like to connect to the internet?

There was no reply from {tag:0}...
I’ll do one better—here’s my Trainer Card instead!

{pageend:Huh? My Trainer Card... It’s gone!}
Sorry! I’ll show you another time!

I’m just showing my Trainer Card as my way of
a greeting.
I hope I get to know you better!
A battle? Of course, but I need time to prepare.
Thanks for waiting! Let’s get our battle started!

Sorry! My Pokémon don’t seem to be feeling too
well right now. Let me battle you another time.
Whoa! I can tell you’re pretty tough!
You used THAT move? That’s good strategy!
Way to go! That was an eye-opener!

Oh! How could you use that Pokémon in
a situation like this?!
You want to trade, huh? Sure, hold on a second.
All right! Let’s trade!

Sorry! I don’t have a Pokémon I can trade right
now. Let’s trade some other time.
Oh yeah! I really wanted this Pokémon!

Finally, I got a Pokémon that I’ve wanted for such
a long time!

You can’t trade if you have only one Pokémon
with you.

If you want to do something with me, just give
me a shout!

You want to mix records with me? OK, I just need
a little time.
Thanks for waiting! Let’s mix our records, then.

Oh, I’m sorry. I have too much to do right now.
Some other time, OK?
Oh, all right. Come see me anytime, OK?
OK! Let’s mix our records!

Oh, sorry! I just can’t right this instant.
Another time, OK?
It’s fun mixing records!
I’m going to mix records with everyone!
Mix it up! Keep mixing!
You should mix records, too!

Whoops! Sorry, but I have to do something else.
Another time, OK?

{pageend:Wait, where’d my Trainer Card go?!}
Sorry! I’ll have to show you later!

We’re showing each other our Trainer Cards to
get acquainted.
Glad to meet you. Please, don’t be a stranger!
A battle? Of course, but I need time to prepare.
Sorry I made you wait! Let’s get started!

I’m terribly sorry, but my Pokémon aren’t
feeling well. Let’s battle another time.
That Pokémon... It’s been raised really well!
That’s it! This is the right move now!
That’s awesome! You can battle that way?
You have exquisite timing for switching Pokémon!
A trade? Of course, but I need time to get ready.
Sorry I made you wait! Let’s get started!

I’m sorry, but I don’t have any Pokémon that I
can trade now. Let’s trade some other time!
I’m trading Pokémon right now.
I finally got that Pokémon I wanted in a trade!

If you want to do something with me, don’t be
shy—just ask!

Oh... Please come by anytime, then.
Thanks for waiting! Let’s mix some records!
Oh, sorry! Let’s do this another time!
It’s so fun to mix records!
I’m going to keep mixing!
Let’s mix it up!
I wonder what’s going to happen.

Welcome to the Union Room!
{pageend:This is the Pokémon Local Club.}
You’ll be able to interact with other nearby
Trainers here.

Trainers in the Local Room are players around
{pageend:you who have also entered the room.}
You may battle with other people in the same
room, trade your Pokémon, or even mix records
and exchange Trainer Cards.
I hope you enjoy your time in the Local Room.

You can talk to someone with a sign up to trade
{pageend:or battle.}
Or use the Y Button to choose what you’d like to
do and put up your own sign!
How to play

I hope you enjoy your time in the Global Room!

Let me explain how to participate in the
{pageend:Pokémon Global Club!}
You can enter the Global Room from either of
the two counters on the left, or by pressing the
{pageend:Y Button!}
In the Global Room, you can set up Link Trades
with Trainers from all over the world!

Trainers in the Local Room are players around
{pageend:you who have also entered the room.}
You may interact with other people in the same
room, such as by trading your Pokémon or
mixing records.
